> [clearnet15bad](#comment_55_1PE7nD7YtXWzNdc1EggdBPaqWTYs6jdkK7): 135 "'s ": "*not clear",That's a possessive. Like in "zaefarani's post". [...]

[135,160]
what I mean by saying disambiguation is that those words needed to be translated in the sentence and you could not concatenate the meanings together to get the results. I think you should get me the sentence or the structure of that so I could do sth about it.

but still I'm not sure about these two. you could show me the place they used so I could correct them
